title: Right-Click on connection opens it when "Single Click on connection opens it" is selected in Connection Options
author: jupitermangue
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
One great feature of mRemoteNG is the option to open a connection by just clicking once on the connection without the need to double-click. However, when this feature is enabled in the Connections Options ("Single click on connection opens it"), it does not only affects left-click but also right-click. I think it should not affect right-click.
